sentences.cn: ...自体免疫疾病，如类风湿性关节炎。

sentences.en: And immune abnormalities related to belong to autoimmune diseases.
sentences.cn: 与机体的免疫学异常有关,是属于自身免疫性疾病.

sentences.en: Autoimmune diseases are more common in women than in men.
sentences.cn: 自身免疫系统疾病在女性中的发病率高于男性.

sentences.en: Autoimmune may participate in the pathological lesion of nerve in auditory neuropathy.
sentences.cn: 自身免疫反应可能参与听神经病神经损害的病理过程.

sentences.en: Autoimmune: such as lupus erythematosus, rheumatoid arthritis, scleroderma, and other.
sentences.cn: 自身免疫性: 如红斑狼疮 、 类风湿关节炎 、 硬皮病等.

sentences.en: Chloroquine is sometimes used to treat autoimmune conditions like lupus and arthritis.
sentences.cn: 氯喹有时候能够用于治疗自身免疫性疾病如狼疮和关节炎.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Necrotizing hyperplastic lymphadenopathy may be an autoimmune disease.
sentences.cn: 结论: 本病可能是一种自身免疫性疾病,预后良好.

sentences.en: Experimental autoimmune neuritis ( EAN ) is widelyconsidered as an animal model of AIDP.
sentences.cn: 实验性自身免疫性神经炎 ( experimental autoimmuneneuritis,EAN) 作为AIDP的动物模型已在世界范围内被公认.

sentences.en: If we figure out exactly which autoimmune condition it is, we can get you better quicker.
sentences.cn: 如果我们能准确却找到是哪种自体免疫状态, 我们就可以使你好得更快.

sentences.en: Now it is considered as an organ specific autoimmune disease.
sentences.cn: 目前认为它是一种器官特异性自身免疫性疾病.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the mechanism of fibrosis in autoimmune hepatitis ( AIH ).
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨自身免疫性肝炎 ( AIH ) 肝纤维化的机制.

sentences.en: Objective To observe and analyse the clinical symptoms of autoimmune hepatitis AIH.
sentences.cn: 目的观察分析自身免疫性肝炎的临床特点.

sentences.en: Results PBC was 59.68 % and AIH 40.32 % in the autoimmune hepatopathy.
sentences.cn: 结果自身免疫性肝病中PBC占59.68%,AIH40.32%.

sentences.en: The patient had been diagnosed with unclassified autoimmune disease in 1993.
sentences.cn: 病患有非特异性自体免疫病史且多年前罹患胃黏膜淋巴瘤.

sentences.en: Used to treat a number of diseases of unknown or autoimmune cause.
sentences.cn: 用于一系列的不明或自体免疫疾病.

sentences.en: You want a negative test for every autoimmune disease known to man?
sentences.cn: 你不是想要一份关于所有人类自体免疫疾病的阴性报告 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: [免疫] 自身免疫；[免疫] 自身免疫性

phrases.tran_cn: 自身免疫病；自体免疫疾病

trans.tran_cn: 自身免疫的，自体免疫的
trans.tran_en: Autoimmune describes medical conditions in which normal cells are attacked by the body's immune system
